tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE knowledge_base (
    kb_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    content TEXT,
    category TEXT,
    multimedia_id INT,
    FOREIGN KEY (multimedia_id) REFERENCES multimedia_content(id)
);

CREATE TABLE images (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    url TEXT,
    caption TEXT
)

CREATE TABLE videos (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    url TEXT,
    title TEXT,
    duration INT
)

CREATE TABLE documents (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    url TEXT,
    title TEXT,
    content TEXT
)

CREATE TABLE multimedia_content (
  id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  content_type TEXT,
  content_url TEXT,
  content_title TEXT,
  content_description TEXT
);

CREATE TABLE multimedia_images (
    image_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    image_name VARCHAR(255),
    image_type VARCHAR(50),
    image_data BYTEA
)

CREATE TABLE multimedia_videos (
    video_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    video_name VARCHAR(255),
    video_type VARCHAR(50),
    video_data BYTEA
)

CREATE TABLE multimedia_documents (
    document_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    document_name VARCHAR(255),
    document_type VARCHAR(50),
    document_data BYTEA
)

CREATE TABLE knowledge_base (
    knowledge_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    knowledge_title VARCHAR(255),
    knowledge_content TEXT,
    knowledge_category VARCHAR(50)
)

CREATE TABLE multimedia_metadata (
    metadata_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    multimedia_id INT,
    metadata_key VARCHAR(50),
    metadata_value VARCHAR(255)
)
